short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Expand your TailwindCSS classes directly on GitHub.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Expandr enhances the GitHub code review and browsing experience by providing developers hover previews for Tailwind class names.

Release Notes
v0.7.1
- The pesky colored arrow on hover previews is no more!
- Loading indicators can now take a much-deserved rest - they are disabled by default and only appear when compiling.
v0.7.0
- Now you can see all the styles associated with your components in one go. Hovering over a component or an HTML tag will present a component preview with all classes expanded.
v0.6.0
- Added a hotkey Alt+E to enable (opt-in) the hover provider
v0.5.0
- Enhanced UX - introducing our notification floaty! This helpful companion will appear if you're not signed in, don't have an active subscription or seat for a private repo, are new around these parts (so we can give you some initial tips), or when unanticipated errors strike
- Loading indicator to let you know as soon as your project compiles and you're ready-to-go with our hover provider.
